description: Pause mpv video automatically when any form is open

userStories.title: Pause mpv when a form opens
userStories.description: As a user, I want the video to automatically pause when I open any form (note, tackle, or confirm discard) so that I don't miss action while entering data.
acceptanceCriteria: In openNoteInput(), after capturing the timestamp, call m.client.Pause() if the client is connected and video is currently playing
In openTackleInput(), after capturing the timestamp, call m.client.Pause() if the client is connected and video is currently playing
When the confirm discard form is opened (in handleNoteFormUpdate and handleTackleFormUpdate), call m.client.Pause() if the client is connected and video is currently playing
Check m.client.GetPaused() before calling Pause() â€” only pause if currently playing (to preserve user's existing pause state)
Guard with m.client != nil && m.client.IsConnected() before any mpv calls
Errors from Pause() are silently ignored (consistent with existing _ = m.client.TogglePause() pattern)
Video does NOT auto-resume when form is closed (submitted, cancelled, or discarded)
